summary: this concertion Seraphine Armor - CBBEv3 - UNP by BloodFree &  jmenaru to chsbhc
descriptionHtml:
Seraphine Armor for CHSBHC
____________[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/161n8s8.jpg[/IMG]_____________
_______[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/10hw2uf.jpg[/IMG]_______
____________[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rgm8ti.jpg[/IMG]___________
This is a conversion of BloodFree &  jmenaru's Seraphine  Armor converted to fit CHSBHC body. The armor can be crafted at a forging station, with leather armor materials. The armor has HD 2048x2048 diffuse and specular maps and HD baked normal maps. It is craftable at any forge, can be improved and can be enchanted. You can find it under the Leather category. Another red and bkack retexture of Seraphine armor also available. 
____________[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2llbmlt.jpg[/IMG]____________
1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher and check the SeraphineHuntedArmor.esp in the Data Files section
if you retexture First, and most importantly, you MUST download the original then download tree texture and Paste the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim.
____________[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1zbgi6a.jpg[/IMG]____________
- Minor rigging/clipping issues on the front of the gloves
- Weight slider not supported for the CBBE version, the armor uses the minimum body weight
____________[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/28mnzb5.jpg[/IMG]____________
CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics 
FNIS Behavior Files and Generator 4.0.2
CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096
NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB 
NoMaaM Walk BBB - inverse orientation
____________[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2hpskkp.jpg[/IMG]____________
Thanks to Bethesda for an amazing game
Thanks to The Nexus for hosting this mod
Seraphine Armor - CBBEv3 - UNP by BloodFree &  jmenaru
author: golgappa
